code: import{listWardrobe as listPostsFromApi,createWardrobe as createPostFromApi}from'../api/wardrobe.js';/*  Search text */export function setfilters(filters){return{type:'@FILTERS/SET_FILTERS',filters:filters};}function endListPosts(posts){return{type:'@POST/END_LIST_POSTS',posts:posts};}function endCreatePost(post){return{type:'@POST/END_CREATE_POST',post:post};}export function listPosts(filter){return function(dispatch,getState){return listPostsFromApi(filter).then(function(posts){dispatch(endListPosts(posts));}).catch(function(err){console.error('Error listing posts',err);});};};export function createPost(id,tags){return function(dispatch,getState){return createPostFromApi(id,tags).then(function(post){dispatch(endCreatePost(post));}).catch(function(err){console.error('Error Creating Posts',err);});};};
